title: [build cop] Spline.cc No constructor could take the source type, or constructor overload resolution was ambiguous

content.raw:
Building ignition math 3 failed on windows https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/BuildCopFail/job/sdformat-ci-default-windows7-amd64/

```
[ 16%] Building CXX object src/CMakeFiles/ignition-math3.dir/Spline.cc.obj
	cd D:\Jenkins\workspace\sdformat-ci-default-windows7-amd64\workspace\ign-math\build\src
	C:\PROGRA~2\MICROS~1.0\VC\bin\X86_AM~1\cl.exe  @C:\Windows\TEMP\nmFB29.tmp
Spline.cc
D:\Jenkins\workspace\sdformat-ci-default-windows7-amd64\workspace\ign-math\src\Spline.cc(259) : warning C4267: '=' : conversion from 'size_t' to 'unsigned int', possible loss of data
D:\Jenkins\workspace\sdformat-ci-default-windows7-amd64\workspace\ign-math\src\Spline.cc(273) : warning C4244: '=' : conversion from '__int64' to 'unsigned int', possible loss of data
D:\Jenkins\workspace\sdformat-ci-default-windows7-amd64\workspace\ign-math\include\ignition/math/Helpers.hh(545) : error C2440: 'initializing' : cannot convert from '__int64' to 'std::_Vector_const_iterator<std::_Vector_val<std::_Simple_types<ignition::math::Vector3<double>>>>'
        No constructor could take the source type, or constructor overload resolution was ambiguous
        C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 12.0\VC\INCLUDE\vector(1800) : see reference to function template instantiation 'bool ignition::math::equal<std::_Vector_const_iterator<std::_Vector_val<std::_Simple_types<ignition::math::Vector3<double>>>>>(const T &,const T &,const T &)' being compiled
        with
        [
            T=std::_Vector_const_iterator<std::_Vector_val<std::_Simple_types<ignition::math::Vector3<double>>>>
        ]
        D:\Jenkins\workspace\sdformat-ci-default-windows7-amd64\workspace\ign-math\include\ignition/math/SplinePrivate.hh(60) : see reference to function template instantiation 'bool std::operator ==<ignition::math::Vector3d,std::allocator<_Ty>>(const std::vector<_Ty,std::allocator<_Ty>> &,const std::vector<_Ty,std::allocator<_Ty>> &)' being compiled
        with
        [
            _Ty=ignition::math::Vector3d
        ]
NMAKE : fatal error U1077: 'C:\PROGRA~2\MICROS~1.0\VC\bin\X86_AM~1\cl.exe' : return code '0x2'
Stop.
```
